title: Elegant Hyderabad Banjara Hills City Break with Luxe Spa, Rooftop Pool & Lounge
description:
Feel the dynamic pulse of Hyderabad from this contemporary haven tucked away in the city's upscale Banjara Hills district. Step inside to discover sleek rooms, spacious workspaces and top-tier amenities. Soak up the glittering city vistas during a swim in the rooftop pool, pamper with soothing treatments at the Sol Spa and stay on track with your wellness routine at the 24-hour fitness centre.

Savour exquisite Indian, Asian, and Italian flavours across the hotel’s restaurants, and unwind with chilled drinks and live music at Zing - Sky Bar + Lounge. When it’s time to explore the City of Nizams, designer shopping at GVK One Mall, cultural events at Lamakaan, and iconic landmarks like Charminar and Golconda Fort await just beyond your door.
offer_address: Road Number 1, Zahara Nagar, Banjara Hills, Hyderabad, Telangana, 500034, India

title: Five-Star Hyderabad Luxury in the Heart of the HITEC City with Four Restaurants & Bars
description: Experience the epitome of luxury at this five-star jewel in the City of Pearls, located in the heart of Hyderabad's thriving IT district. Savour authentic Indian flavours at Kanak, the hotel's signature restaurant, or indulge in Italian delicacies at Tuscany. Venture out to explore the historic Charminar or the tranquil Hussain Sagar Lake, both within easy reach. Upon your return, rejuvenate at the Trident Spa or take a leisurely swim in the azure outdoor pool. For a touch of local culture, visit the nearby Salar Jung Museum, home to a vast collection of art and antiques.
offer_address: HITEC City, Near Cyber Towers, Madhapur, Hyderabad, Telangana 500081, India

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Hyderabad Hitec City
title: Sleek Hyderabad Hotel near Major IT Offices
description: Stay in the business district where IT thrives at Holiday Inn Express Hyderabad HITEC City, an IHG Hotel. With a location close to Raheja Mindspace IT Park, Cyber Towers, local shopping centres and landmarks, you will be amply primed for both business and pleasure. Fire up your muscles with a workout at the hotel's fitness centre, charge into your day with a Grab & Go breakfast and feel at home with an on-site laundromat available 24/7.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Hyderabad HITEC City, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Survey No. 35, Phoenix Avance Business Park, Phase 2, HITEC City, Hyderabad, Telangana 500081, India

title: Contemporary Hyderabad Indulgence near Airport with Pool & Onsite Dining
description:
Discover true ease and comfort in this elegant Novotel sanctuary surrounded by tranquil gardens and situated mere minutes from Hyderabad's airport. Spend your days lounging by the shimmering outdoor pool or treat yourself to soothing treatments at the indulgent spa before retreating to your private room or suite.

When hunger strikes, dine at The Food Exchange, a signature multi‑cuisine restaurant open all day, then unwind at The Gourmet Bar with well-crafted drinks. If you wish to explore, Hyderabad's cultural highlights like Charminar monument, Golconda Fort and the Chowmahalla Palace are all within a 30‑minute drive away.
offer_address: R. Gandhi International Airport Shamshabad, Hyderabad Telangana 500108, India

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Hyderabad Banjara Hills
title: Modern India City Stay with On-site Dining & Fitness Centre
description: Relax right in the heart of a ritzy neighborhood at the Holiday Inn Express Hyderabad Banjara Hills, an IHG Hotel. Within walking distance of City Centre and GVK One shopping centres as well as exciting dining options, you'll find yourself in one of the most upscale areas within Telangana's capital. Start off your day with a nourishing breakfast at the hotel’s own Express Café and wind down in the well-equipped gym later in the afternoon.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Hyderabad Banjara Hills, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 6-3-563/2nd Floor/A Erranmanzil Colony, Somajiguda, Banjara Hills, Hyderabad, Telangana 500082, India
